name: BigShots
abstract: Gear up, team up, and exterminate! Become the ultimate mech pilot in BIG SHOTS!

detail.app_languages: English, Japanese, Dutch, German, Simplified Chinese, French, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:
FEATURES:
Modifiers

With modifiers players can upgrade their game play experience to the next level! Make the game easier with extra revives, make the game harder with a floor made of acid. There is something for everybody, go into the game and explore the possibilities. (Price Inc. is not liable for any damages made when playing with modifiers)

Leaderboards

Compare yourself to your friends and colleagues with the all new leaderboards. Play a run, rack up points and see yourself shine in that first spot. Leaderboards can be found under the Career tab in the Hangar

FIXES:
The UI interaction ray for when the player wants to interact with UI has been given a makeover to look better and more clear

We added more information to the upgrade acquired screen that includes upgrade rarity, upgrade weapon and upgrade icon

Enemy death explosions have been tweaked to show more different explosions when killing an enemy
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4, PICO 4 Ultra
